name: AllianceBernstein Holding, L.P.
description: AllianceBernstein provides investment management services to institutional (42% of assets under management), retail (41%), and private (17%) clients through products that includes mutual funds, hedge funds, and separately managed accounts. At the end of October 2024, AB had $793 billion in managed assets, composed primarily of fixed-income (37% of AUM) and equity (42%) strategies, with other investments (made up of asset allocation services and certain other alternative investments) accounting for the remainder.
